comment._content: Mexico City newspaper editor who opposed the Mexican president, General Diaz, and went into exile in New York City, when that opposition became a very dangerous position to hold.

comment.author: 38098863@N05
comment._content: This is a picture of Heriberto Barron, an outspoke Hispanic journalist.  He was born and raised in Mexico and eventually fled to the United States to avoid death.

comment.author: 38129431@N08
comment._content: I appreciate this picture of Heriberto Barron for a multitude of reasons.  He believed in something and stood up for himself against a much larger and potentially dangerous enemy.  He also was exiled to New York which is where I'm from so I intend to learn more about him.
